data.title: Wake Forest University
data.meta_description: Hunter Bandy (20) Defender - 2015 (Junior) Started all 22 games on defense for the Demon Deacons ... Played 1,869 minutes on the season of Wake Forest's 2,03...
data.text:
2015 (Junior)

Started all 22 games on defense for the Demon Deacons ... Played 1,869 minutes on the season of Wake Forest's 2,031 ... Tallied five shots, three of which were on target. Helped Wake Forest earn 12 shutouts on the season, which included a five-game run that tied the program record for most consecutive shutouts ... Helped Wake Forest amass the second-longest shutouts streak in program history that lasted 543 minutes from Oct. 2 through Oct. 23 ... Also helped the Demon Deacons post an 0.58 goals against average on the season, which fell just short of the program record set in 2007.

2014 (Sophomore)

Established himself as a dependable starter on the defense ... Started 18 games while playing in all 19 ... Recorded one goal and one assist ... Season debut came in the opener against No. 4 UCLA (8/29) ... Tallied an assist and scored his first career goal in the 4-0 win over Howard (10/21) ... Started and played all 110 minutes against Clemson (11/9) in the ACC Tournament and vs. UMBC (11/20) in the NCAA Tournament.

2013 (Freshman)

Made his collegiate debut against Monmouth (9/1) ... Took his first-career shot at Boston College in 21 minutes of action (9/7) ... Earned his first-career start and played 30 minutes at Charlotte (10/1) ... Has also started games at Maryland (10/19), at Duke (10/25) and vs. Syracuse (11/8).

High School/Club

Played club soccer for Team Boca under the direction of Michael Araujo and high school school soccer for Marcello Castillo at Boca Raton Community High School ... Won the 2010 High School State Championship ... Was named First Team All-County in 2010 and 2011 ... Was then named County Player of the Year in 2012 ... Member of the National Honor Society and earned the Gold Presidential Award for academic excellence all four years.

Personal

Born on December 2, 1994 ... Son of Karen Bandy ... Full name is Hunter Christian Bandy ... Has a brother, Trey (25), and a sister, Kelsey (21).
